## MetadataInspector.defineMetadata() method

Define metadata for the given target

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static defineMetadata<T>(key: MetadataKey<T, DecoratorType>, value: T, target: Object, member?: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | <code>MetadataKey&lt;T, DecoratorType&gt;</code> | Metadata key |
|  value | <code>T</code> | Metadata value |
|  target | <code>Object</code> | Target for the metadata |
|  member | <code>string</code> | Optional property or method name |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
